name: pm2-meteor
description: Simplest way to deploy, scale and run Meteor Apps with PM2.

scripts.build: coffee --output lib --compile src && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > lib/pm2-meteor && cat lib/pm2-meteor.js >> lib/pm2-meteor && chmod +x lib/pm2-meteor && rm lib/pm2-meteor.js

author: andruschka <fritz.andrej@me.com> (http://github.com/andruschka)
